name: BAD BUILD (Triangle, BlueBaldwin, exophagious)
description:
Build your opponent's spaceship badly so that it is vulnerable by design, and then fight to the death in space!

Create spaceships by combining different components from a variety of options. There are hulls, weapons, engines and shields to choose from! Each component has different strengths, so be careful to not over power your enemy's ship! 

Tutorial:

Player 1:                                                              Player 2:
WASD= movement                                      ARROW KEYS= movement
SPACE= shoot                                                 ENTER= shoot

Once both spaceships have been designed, Player 1 & 2 must shoot to try to kill the other. Watch out for pesky meteors too!
